body.p:
Required
@staff?
@dur="the 'longest' (= the minimum) value of the descendants <note/>/@dur or <rest/>/@dur" (the case when they have different values). Example:<chord dur="8"> <note dur="8"/> <note dur="16"/> </chord>
Rule attributeValueDescendants
element mei:chord[not(@sameas) or not(@copyof)]
attribute dur
descendants (descendant::mei:note or descendant::mei:rest)
fence min
phase refTexts_v3, altTexts_v3, refTexts_v4, altTexts_v4
@tstamp with the value '*(.*******), e.g '3.25'.
Rule matchesAttributeValue
element mei:chord[not((@grace, @copyof, @sameas, ancestor::mei:graceGrp))]
attribute tstamp
RegEx \d(\.(\d){1,7})?
phase refTexts_v3, altTexts_v3, refTexts_v4, altTexts_v4

Optional:
@dots="the highest value of @dots the descendants <note/> or <rest/>". Example:<chord dots="1"> <note dots="1"/> <note dots="0"/> </chord>
Rule attributeValueDescendants
element mei:chord[not(@sameas) or not(@copyof)]
attribute dots
descendants (descendant::mei:note[@dots] or descendant::mei:rest[@dots])
fence max
phase refTexts_v3, altTexts_v3, refTexts_v4, altTexts_v4
